data.question: What is the molar ratio of 12-crown-4, CdSO4, and NH4SCN used in the synthesis of [(12C4)2Cd][Cd2(SCN)6]?
What type of crystal structure does [(12C4)2Cd][Cd2(SCN)6] exhibit?
data.answer: Monoclinic unit cell with space group C2/c

data.question: What is the yield percentage of the synthesis of [(12C4)2Cd][Cd2(SCN)6] based on 12C4?
What role does the [(12C4)2Cd]2+ dication serve in the structure of [(12C4)2Cd][Cd2(SCN)6]?
data.answer: Serves as the 'spacer', 'controller' of the crystal packing, and 'template' for the formation of the 2-D motif.

data.question: How are the Cd atoms within each [Cd2(NCS)2] dimer separated in [(12C4)2Cd][Cd2(SCN)6]?
data.answer: By 3.72 Å and bridged by two N atoms from two NCS groups.

data.question: What is the average Cd···Cd distance bridged by the linkage SCN- ligands in [(12C4)2Cd][Cd2(SCN)6]?
What is the significance of the four ν(CN) peaks observed in the IR spectroscopy of [(12C4)2Cd][Cd2(SCN)6]?
data.answer: They are highly characteristic of the particular 2-D structure of [(12C4)2Cd][Cd2(SCN)6] and can be used to identify the various coordination types of SCN- observed in the structure.

data.question: How does the arrangement of the [(12C4)2Cd]2+ dications and the [Cd4(SCN)8] squares relate to the crystallographic symmetry in [(12C4)2Cd][Cd2(SCN)6]?
data.answer: The [(12C4)2Cd]2+ dications and the [Cd4(SCN)8] squares are located on the crystallographic twofold symmetry axes along the b axis, while the [Cd2(NCS)2] dimers reside on the crystallographic inversion centers.

data.question: True or False: The synthesis of [(12C4)2Cd][Cd2(SCN)6] was initially intended to produce a sandwich cation of [(12C4)2NH4]+.
True or False: The [(12C4)2Cd]2+ dication in [(12C4)2Cd][Cd2(SCN)6] is coordinated with six oxygens from two 12C4 ligands.
True or False: The crystal structure of [(12C4)2Cd][Cd2(SCN)6] is based on a one-dimensional polymeric structure.
True or False: The synthesis of [(12C4)2Cd][Cd2(SCN)6] involves the use of an aqueous solution of 12-crown-4.
True or False: The [(12C4)2Cd]2+ dications in [(12C4)2Cd][Cd2(SCN)6] are octahedrally coordinated.
True or False: The structure of [(12C4)2Cd][Cd2(SCN)6] includes both in-plane and out-of-plane SCN- ligands.
